import React, { useState } from "react"; const Signup = () => { const [username, setUsername] = useState(""); const [useremail, setUserEmail] = useState(""); const [userpwd, setUserpwd] = useState(""); const checkUserAndRegister = async () => { console.log("in checkUserAndRegister"); console.log(username+" "+useremail+" "+userpwd); await fetch('http://127.0.0.1:8086/api/auth/register', { method: 'POST', body: JSON.stringify({ "username": username, "email": useremail, "password": userpwd }), headers:{ 'Content-type': 'application/json;cha' } }); } return (
